title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Fusion Energy
purpose: To accelerate policy change to facilitate the commercialisation of fusion technology and provide a forum for parliamentarians of all parties to work together to make the case for investment in fusion energy.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 0115 646 6404.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Valerie Jamieson, The Fusion Cluster. Tel: 07788448478
contact_details.secretariat: The Fusion Cluster acts as the group's secretariat.https://thefusioncluster.com/

detailed_benefits.Description: The Fusion Cluster acts as the group's secretariat and pays Henham Strategy to help them fulfil this role From : 23/07/2024 To  : 22/07/2025
